expectations.text: An AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory
The file contains a section describing the project's directory structure
expectations.evidence: Architecture section with tree diagram and bullet descriptions of API, workers, shared

expectations.text: The file includes build and test commands
expectations.evidence: Development and Testing sections with commands

expectations.text: The file mentions the key technologies
expectations.evidence: Opening paragraph: 'Express handles HTTP routing, Prisma manages PostgreSQL access, BullMQ processes background jobs via Redis, and Zod validates inputs'

expectations.text: The file mentions database migration or seeding commands
expectations.evidence: Setup section: 'npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed', plus db:studio in Development

expectations.text: The file does not contain generic filler
expectations.evidence: Line 29: 'npm install' in Setup section â€” the skill explicitly says not to include obvious install instructions

expectations.text: Commands are formatted as bullet list items rather than headings with code blocks
expectations.evidence: Development (lines 42-46) and Testing (lines 50-51) use '- `cmd` -- description' bullet format. Setup uses a code block but that's a multi-step install sequence, not individual commands.
